room_title: Escape room "The Conspiracy Theory" by Xtreme Xcapes in Charlotte
room_address: 246 North New Hope Road Gastonia NC 28054
room_description:
A well-known conspiracy nut has disappeared without a trace. You have been hired by his family to help locate his whereabouts because the police will not take them seriously. You have 60 minutes to find the
clues that will lead you to his location and find a way out of the room or you may suffer the same fate as him.
